user.title: Ajax Systems Setup
user.description: Choose the integration method for your Ajax alarm system.

data_description.integration_type:
SIA: Receive events via SIA DC-09 protocol
Jeedom MQTT: Receive sensor states from Jeedom (recommended)
Jeedom Server: Full control via Jeedom API
MQTT: Legacy Jeedom bridge

sia.title: SIA Protocol Configuration
sia.description: Configure the SIA DC-09 receiver. Set up your Ajax Hub to send events to this Home Assistant instance.

data_description.sia_port: Port to listen for SIA events (default: 2410)
data_description.sia_account: Account code configured in your Ajax Hub
data_description.sia_encryption_key: AES encryption key if encryption is enabled
data_description.mqtt_publish_enabled: Publish entity state changes to the local MQTT broker
data_description.mqtt_publish_prefix: Topic prefix for MQTT messages (e.g. ajax)
data_description.mqtt_publish_attributes: Include entity attributes in MQTT messages
data_description.mqtt_discovery_enabled: Create MQTT discovery config for other systems

jeedom_mqtt.title: Jeedom MQTT Configuration
jeedom_mqtt.description: Subscribe to Jeedom MQTT events to receive Ajax sensor states. Requires Jeedom with ajaxSystem plugin publishing to MQTT.

data_description.jeedom_mqtt_topic: MQTT topic where Jeedom publishes Ajax events (default: jeedom/cms/event)
data_description.jeedom_mqtt_language: Language to translate French sensor names to
data_description.use_sia: Enable SIA receiver for additional event types
data_description.sia_port: Port to listen for SIA events (default: 2410)
data_description.sia_account: Account code configured in your Ajax Hub
data_description.mqtt_publish_enabled: Publish entity state changes to the local MQTT broker
data_description.mqtt_publish_prefix: Topic prefix for MQTT messages (e.g. ajax)
data_description.mqtt_publish_attributes: Include entity attributes in MQTT messages
data_description.mqtt_discovery_enabled: Create MQTT discovery config for other systems

mqtt.title: MQTT Bridge Configuration
mqtt.description: Configure MQTT bridge using Jeedom. Requires Jeedom with Ajax plugin to be running.

data_description.mqtt_prefix: MQTT topic prefix used by Jeedom
data_description.use_sia: Enable SIA receiver for direct hub events
data_description.sia_port: Port to listen for SIA events

jeedom.title: Jeedom Server Configuration
jeedom.description: Connect to a local or remote Jeedom server with the ajaxSystem plugin installed. This provides FULL CONTROL including arm/disarm.

data_description.jeedom_host: IP address or hostname of your Jeedom server (e.g. 192.168.1.100 or jeedom.local)
data_description.jeedom_port: Port number (default 80 for HTTP, 443 for HTTPS)
data_description.jeedom_use_ssl: Enable HTTPS connection (recommended for remote access)
data_description.jeedom_api_key: API key from Jeedom Configuration > API
data_description.use_sia: Enable SIA for faster real-time events
data_description.sia_port: Port to listen for SIA events
data_description.sia_account: Account code configured in your Ajax Hub
data_description.mqtt_publish_enabled: Publish entity state changes to the local MQTT broker
data_description.mqtt_publish_prefix: Topic prefix for MQTT messages (e.g. ajax)
data_description.mqtt_publish_attributes: Include entity attributes in MQTT messages
data_description.mqtt_discovery_enabled: Create MQTT discovery config for other systems
